personalInfo.name: S.N.M. Rayhan
personalInfo.title: Digital Marketing Specialist | SEO and Paid Advertising Expert

summary: A results-driven Digital Marketing and Performance Specialist with a strong analytical foundation from a B.Sc. in Computer Science. Proven experience in full-funnel campaign management, leveraging technical acumen for advanced tracking (CAPI, GTM) and comprehensive SEO audits. Expertise spans paid search (Meta and Google Ads), CRO, content strategy, and Email Marketing. Eager to apply data-informed strategies to drive measurable ROI and deliver profitable growth in a challenging industry role.

Designed and executed multi-step Email Marketing campaigns, utilizing A/B testing on subject lines and CTAs to achieve a 28% lift in engagement rate.
Conducted in-depth competitor analysis and market research to inform campaign strategies for over 15 client-facing projects.
Created automated lead nurturing sequences using Messenger Chatbots, improving response time and initial lead qualification effectiveness.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Trainee (Academic Project)
responsibilities: Managed a simulated $5k monthly budget across Meta and Google Ads, applying CRO techniques to achieve an 18% lift in conversion volume.
Oversaw strategic planning for a simulated product launch, mapping the customer journey and managing the entire marketing funnel.
Implemented Facebook Pixel and Conversion API alongside Google Tag Manager (GTM), establishing end-to-end conversion tracking capabilities.
Executed a comprehensive Technical SEO Audit using SEMrush/Ahrefs, identifying 30+ critical structural issues and recommending fixes for a projected 10% increase in organic visibility.
